channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 捷克央行将借贷成本降至近两年来的最低点
item.description:
The Czech central bank cuts borrowing costs to the lowest in almost two years https://t.co/VEQnnzBf8q

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 高盛首席经济学家 Jan Hatzius 表示，尽管最近几个月美国通胀率有所上升，但仍处于下降通道中。
item.description:
US inflation is still on a downward path despite the higher prints in recent months, said Goldman Sachs’ Chief Economist Jan Hatzius https://t.co/Mp8EW0L54p

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 随着加密货币价格呈上升趋势，专注于加密货币的风险投资公司 Haun Ventures 正在扩充其投资者名单
item.description:
Crypto currency-focused venture capital firm Haun Ventures is adding to its roster of investors as the price of crypto trends upward https://t.co/owP33z4Khy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰总理称受阻的美国资金最快本月到位
item.description:
Ukraine’s prime minister says blocked US funding could arrive as soon as this month https://t.co/P19gLRE6y4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）正在规划一条通往顶级企业的道路，预计到本十年末，该公司将发展成为一个价值超过 10 万亿美元的行业。
item.description:
Goldman Sachs Asset Management is charting a path to break into the top ranks of what’s projected to grow into a more than $10 trillion industry by the end of the decade. https://t.co/3z0cGGhzrM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 道富花了一年多的时间准备其技术，以加快结算时间，与众多基金管理公司一起进行调整，以避免因 5 月底生效的法规而可能出现的交易失败。
item.description:
State Street has spent more than a year preparing its technology for faster settlement times, joining a slew of fund managers making adjustments to avoid failed trades that could occur as a result of regulations effective in late May. https://t.co/DjyAluBf0D

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 安哥拉政府工人开始为期三天的罢工，要求提高工资和降低税收
item.description:
Angolan government workers begin a three-day strike to press for higher wages and lower taxes https://t.co/OPZHt8ER0w

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 计划外加息后，埃及取消下一次货币政策委员会会议
item.description:
Egypt Cancels Next MPC Meeting Following Unscheduled Rate Hike https://t.co/J6gIRtxqAV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）在政治压力下决定不发放特别股息，这引发了股票大跌，市值损失数十亿美元。然而，债券持有人的日子却还不错。
item.description:
Petrobras' decision to skip a special dividend amid political pressure triggered an equity selloff that wiped billions from its market capitalization. Bondholders, however, are doing just fine. https://t.co/7cWQNa3bls

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 苏丹宣布石油出口遭遇不可抗力，称因位于战区的输油管道发生 "重大破裂"，苏丹不再接受邻国南苏丹的石油供应
item.description:
Sudan declared a force majeure on oil exports, saying it's no longer receiving supplies from neighboring South Sudan following a "major rupture" in a pipeline that's in a war zone https://t.co/DKbntesWzB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 随着通货膨胀率的稳步下降，现金账户的利率比几年前更有吸引力。在本纳税年度即将结束时，请务必用完您的 ISA 免税额。
item.description:
With the inflation rate steadily easing, interest rates on cash accounts have become far more appealing than they have been in several years. Be sure to use up your ISA allowance as the tax year comes to an end. https://t.co/KGpgkGunRe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据当地警方称，不明身份的武装分子在巴基斯坦瓜达尔港附近发动了袭击
item.description:
Unidentified militants have staged an attack near Pakistan’s Gwadar port complex, according to local police https://t.co/KAwTqkjGFv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 请关注我们的博客直播，了解休斯顿 CERAWeek by S&P Global 能源行业会议第三天的最新情况。
item.description:
Follow our live blog for the latest updates from the third day of CERAWeek by S&P Global energy industry conference in Houston https://t.co/R9RNOlupDI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: @JoeRyanNews 写道：以创新为荣的能源行业有了一项值得看好的新技术：人工智能。
item.description:
The energy industry, which has prided itself on innovation, has a flashy new technology to be bullish about: artificial intelligence, writes @JoeRyanNews https://t.co/VeBfa6tqhD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 英国通胀率下降对利率和生活成本危机的影响

item.title: 一个与银行额外一级债券相似的利基保险债券市场正在升温，投资者纷纷抢购这种债券
item.description:
A niche insurance bond market with similarities to banks’ Additional Tier 1s is heating up, with investors rushing to buy the debt https://t.co/M7SatUPY12

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 由于货币疲软和高通胀等经济不利因素使投资者望而却步，2023 年流入非洲技术和初创企业的风险资本下降了 31%，降至 45 亿美元
item.description:
Venture capital inflows to African technology and start-up firms declined 31% in 2023 to $4.5 billion as economic headwinds including weak currencies and high inflation dissuaded investors https://t.co/Wtr4IrWaO2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 中国在秘鲁投资建设的新集装箱港口将改变南美西海岸的贸易流动方式
item.description:
A new container port under construction in Peru with Chinese investment is going to transform how trade flows through the west coast of South America https://t.co/a0cE7MLryo

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 科技界历史最悠久的公司之一悄无声息地击败了华尔街一些最热门的股票
item.description:
One of the oldest companies in tech has been quietly trouncing some of the hottest stocks on Wall Street https://t.co/fZjxsY3TTR

item.title: 他们凭借 300 亿美元的零售帝国成为超级富豪。但现在，英国伊萨兄弟的警示灯正在闪烁
item.description:
They turbocharged their $30 billion retail empire to become super rich.

But now warning lights are flashing for the UK's Issa brothers https://t.co/C8pgV1ce59

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: PDD 周三在纽约股市盘前交易中股价大涨 15%，此前该电子商务平台公布的收入强于预期，因为其加大了海外扩张的力度。
item.description:
PDD shares jump 15% in New York premarket trading Wednesday after the E-commerce platform reported stronger-than-expected revenue as it ramped up its overseas expansion https://t.co/zg6HQBCx5A

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 荷兰政府提出了废除一种高风险银行债券的想法，因为去年该资产类别暂时陷入了严重的动荡之中
item.description:
The Dutch government floats the idea of abolishing a risky type of bank bonds after the asset class was temporarily thrown into deep turmoil last year https://t.co/dQGqwaGAKc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 上周美国抵押贷款利率接近 7%，导致购房申请减少

US mortgage rates approached 7% last week, prompting a decline in applications for home purchases https://t.co/6sgYbX56C5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 瑞士信贷的旗舰房地产基金去年受到全球房地产市场危机的冲击，投资者损失惨重
item.description:
Credit Suisse’s flagship real estate fund incurred deep losses for its investors last year as it got buffeted by the crisis in global real estate markets https://t.co/EG1fd6NkXM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 惠誉将卡塔尔的信用评级从 AA-上调至 AA，使这个天然气资源丰富的国家的信用评级高于法国和英国
item.description:
Qatar's been upgraded to AA from AA- by Fitch, lifting the gas-rich country’s credit rating above that of France and the UK https://t.co/ByfQcKjPDN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 伦敦地铁的列车司机将于 4 月和 5 月再次举行罢工，这也是因工作条件而引发的持续争议的一部分
item.description:
Train drivers on the London Underground will strike again in April and May as part of an ongoing dispute over working conditions https://t.co/MYKem3Vrwx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 2 月份，伦敦房屋租赁费用以创纪录的速度飙升，每月增加近 200 英镑的支出
item.description:
London home rental costs jumped at a record pace in February, adding almost £200 a month to their payments https://t.co/XgC5HxVgRc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 中国太阳能制造商凌达（Lingda）终止了耗资 13 亿美元新建电池生产厂的计划，因为严重的产能过剩威胁着该行业的破产和整合浪潮。
item.description:
Chinese solar manufacturer Lingda terminates plans to build a new $1.3 billion cell production plant as severe overcapacity threatens a wave of bankruptcies and consolidations in the industry https://t.co/h1gpzx3WzG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美联储本周可能不会发出即将降息的信号，而是继续关注顽固的通胀问题
item.description:
The Federal Reserve will likely avoid signaling an imminent rate cut this week, staying focused on stubborn inflation https://t.co/Vhgseezeqw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 莱茵金属首席执行官阿明-帕佩尔格（Armin Papperger）自 2013 年掌舵以来，公司股价飙升了近 1200%，他正从军备需求推动的涨势中获取利润
item.description:
Rheinmetall CEO Armin Papperger, who has overseen an almost 1,200% surge in the shares since taking the helm in 2013, is pocketing profits from a rally fueled by demand for armaments https://t.co/TKu9GR9aTH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024
